title: Has Super-Sized Route Ruined Strade Bianche? Crashes, Big-Name Absences Fuel Debate
content:
Race director Vegni defends new-look Strade Bianche and blames faster bikes for carnage: 'This race is not too difficult or too dangerous for real cyclists.'

Read the full article at Has Super-Sized Route Ruined Strade Bianche? Crashes, Big-Name Absences Fuel Debate on Velo.
author: ahood
